description:
Fessenden Laumer & DeAngelo, PLLC, is an Olean, New York, law office that serves the entire region. We provide experienced personal injury representation for nearly every type of case.

Broad Personal Injury Practice
Experience and a diverse legal team allow us to efficiently and effectively handle a variety of types of injuries. These include car accidents; truck accidents; small-plane, helicopter, commercial airliner, train, bus and subway injuries; premises liability; medical malpractice; nursing home abuse; asbestos and mesothelioma; birth injuries; brain injuries; product liability and wrongful death.

Complex Cases
Our law office has the resources necessary to take cases as far as they go. This includes litigation and even beyond, to appeals.

We also have a large, knowledgeable team capable of managing complex class-action lawsuits. Regardless of how much work it takes, we dedicate ourselves to securing the best possible outcome for every case we accept.

Associated Practice Areas
We protect the rights and interests of injured people across several legal areas. This includes disability law, workers' compensation, employment law, wage-and-hour disputes, labor law and even real estate law. Further information about specific cases is available upon request.

Respect And Results
At Fessenden Laumer & DeAngelo, PLLC, we are proud of our reputation and of our results. However, we know that our law office is successful because we focus on our clients' needs. To that end, we offer free consultations, virtual appointments and credit card payment options.
